Property.name: allowKlonoaMoves
Property.HelpText: Use Klonoa moves for a new gameplay experience. Disable this if you just want a simple Sonic skin.

Property.name: nerfPhysics
Property.HelpText: Enable custom physics to fit Klonoa speed more.

Property.name: useHP
Property.HelpText: Use HP to manage Klonoa life instead of rings, this will force Klonoa objects to show up.

Property.name: hpMax
Property.HelpText: Select your HP max. (No effect if "Use HP" is disabled.)

Property.name: infiniteHover
Property.HelpText: Have no fear, Klonoa is here!

Property.name: obj
Property.HelpText: Replace some objects with their Klonoa counterpart.

Property.name: music
Property.HelpText: Replace menu and ice cap 3 music with Klonoa counterpart.
